mapper.select: select top 1 iActivityId as 'lid', sName as 'name',sTitle as 'title', sContent as 'content', sPicUrl as 'pic', dAddTime as 'add', iCountryId , sBrands as 'brands', dBeginTime as 'start', dEndTime as 'end', iSellerId as 'sid', sSellerName as 'sname', sPosition as 'addr', sVideoCover as 'vcover', sVideoUrl as 'vurl', iAction as 'action', bAppConfirmed as 'confirm', sLatlng as 'latlng' from Ymt_Activity where iActivityId=#{ActivityId}
SELECT sFlag,sCountryNameZh FROM dbo.Ymt_Country WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE iCountryId = #{CountryId}

SELECT a.sBrand,a.dAddTime FROM [dbo].[Ymt_Products] a WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN dbo.Ymt_ProductsInLive b WITH(NOLOCK) ON a.sProductId = b.sProductId WHERE b.[iActivityId] = #{ActivityId} and isnull(b.iaction,0)>-1 order by a.dAddTime DESC
